TextView.android:text: Avoid to use tobacco/alcohol products: How to quit

o Set a quit date. Within 2 weeks is best. 
o Tell family and friends for social support and help! 
o Review past quit attempt experiences. What worked? What didnâ€™t? 
o Anticipate challenges. Symptoms such as irritability, insomnia and coughing may occur for 2-3 weeks after quitting 
o Remove tobacco products. 
o In addition, ask family members who use tobacco not to smoke around you or leave their tobacco products where you can get them during your quit attempt. 
o Avoid betel leaf and betel nut because these may influence you to take tobacco again. 
o Avoid alcohol. About half of smokers who try to quit and replace do so when drinking
